title: Draft Genome Sequence of the Bordetella bronchiseptica Swine Isolate KM22
body: The Illunina HiSeq short read sequence has been deposited at the European Nucleotide Archive with the accession no. ERS027415. This whole-genome shotgun project has been deposited in DDBJ/ENA/GenBank under the accession no. JNHR00000000. The version described in this paper is the first version, JNHR01000000.
